title: "LoL is pay to win, Riot is greedy"
body:
http://www.gamasutra.com/view/news/223071/Dont_monetize_like_League_of_Legends_consultant_says.php

> LoL gives away too much for free, Weidemann suggests. The company could aggressively increase its revenues across even a smaller player base, and chooses not to. 

I think Riot is a shit company, but they are one of the few remaining developers that aren't greedy as fuck.
